pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package installs various utilities for the GPL Electronic Design Automation tools (gEDA) including: convert_sym, garchive, gmk_sym, gnet_hier_verilog.sh, grenum, gsch2pcb, gschlas, gschupdate, gsymfix.pl, gsymupdate, olib, pads_backannotate, pcb_backannotate, refdes_renum, sarlacc_schem, sarlacc_sym, smash_megafile and tragesym.
